issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Advocate for reducing mass incarceration, supporting rehabilitation programs, and ending systemic racism in criminal justice system

issues.title: Mental Health Support
issues.description: Increase funding for mental health services, reduce stigma, and improve access to mental healthcare

issues.title: Transportation Equity
issues.description: Expand public transit infrastructure, reduce transportation costs for low-income communities

issues.title: Affordable Housing
issues.description: Support policies to increase affordable housing, protect renters' rights, combat housing discrimination

issues.title: Climate Change Mitigation
issues.description: Support Green New Deal-style policies, renewable energy transition, environmental justice initiatives

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Increase education funding, support public schools, reduce student debt, expand community college access

issues.title: Workers' Rights
issues.description: Support minimum wage increases, worker protections, union organizing rights

donors.data_source: California Secretary of State Campaign Finance Database
